creation_history: Created by Agni on August 24th, 2021. Reason: Andreas requested a "particularly hairy yak" [(first message in the chain)](https://discord.com/channels/830522505605283862/830525235803586570/879746499108556881).
description: This one's a hairy yak to shave. Used for particularly difficult/cumbersome/long-winded problems.
remark: How did this grow so fast?
name: Hairyak
